page.title: 16Our visit to the Roman Baths
page.content: By Anthony Hill aged 6 On our visit to the Roman Baths we saw a big pool that was 41 metres long. We turned a corner and saw the plcce where they played games We had drinks and in there there was a wash basin and some drains. We went up a bit and saw a big computer screen. We watched it. It was showing us what the rooms of the baths used to look like. Then we went on a bit, there was a patch of paving stones and some drains. Then we went to the back where there was a mosaic which used to be on the floor but now its on the wall.
